abilities.name: Eviscerating Fly-by
abilities.rule: Each time this unit ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit (excluding **MONSTER** and **VEHICLE** units) that it moved over during that move. If you do, roll one D6 for each model in this unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Grav-talon
abilities.rule: The bearer’s melee weapons have the **[LANCE]** ability.

abilities.name: Cluster caltrops
abilities.rule: Each time you roll to inflict wounds using this unit’s Eviscerating Fly-by ability, you can re-roll one D6 for each model in this unit equipped with cluster caltrops.

wargear_abilities.name: Grav-talon
wargear_abilities.rule: The bearer’s melee weapons have the **[LANCE]** ability.

wargear_abilities.name: Cluster caltrops
wargear_abilities.rule: Each time you roll to inflict wounds using this unit’s Eviscerating Fly-by ability, you can re-roll one D6 for each model in this unit equipped with cluster caltrops.

wargear_options:
■ For every 3 models in this unit, 1 model’s splinter rifle can be replaced with one of the following:
◦ 1 blaster
◦ 1 heat lance

■ For every 3 models in this unit, 1 model can be equipped with one of the following:
◦ 1 grav-talon
◦ 1 cluster caltrops
■ The Arena Champion can be equipped with 1 agoniser.
unit_composition:
■ **1 Arena Champion**
■ **2-5 Reavers**

**Every model is equipped with:** splinter pistol; splinter rifle; bladevanes.
